类 Car

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class Car
extends javax.swing.JButton
implements java.awt.event.FocusListener
    This class represents the car template. It contains methods to judge the validity of movements of the cars.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    作者:
    Pei Yinan
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • outOfBound

        public boolean outOfBound(int newX,
                          int newY)
        This method judges whether the car's x and y coordinates are out of bound.
        参数:
        newX - The new x coordinate after the move
        newY - The new y coordinate after the move
        返回:
        Judge whether the car is within the bound

      • collide

        public boolean collide(int newX,
                       int newY,
                       Car[] cars)
        This method judges whether there are other cars around
        参数:
        newX - The new x coordinate after the move
        newY - The new y coordinate after the move
        cars - Other vehicles
        返回:
        Judge whether it collides with other vehicles

        public void moveLeft(int x,
                     int y,
                     Car[] cars)
        This method implements the function of making the cars move left.
        参数:
        x - x coordinate of the car
        y - y coordinate of the car
        cars - other vehicles
